#Abstract

Here we examine the life-expectancy data! 

#Life Expectancy Analysis

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(gapminder)
data("gapminder_unfiltered")
```

```{r}
gapminder_unfiltered
```

```{r}
gapminder_unfiltered %>%
  group_by(country, year) %>%
  summarize(lifeExp) %>%
  arrange(desc(lifeExp))
```
